HomePage.whatIsBolaoDescription: In Brazil, a bolão is a betting pool between friends around soccer championships. It's very popular during the World Cup and major tournaments. This app makes it easy to create and manage your own —
HomePage.step1Description: Start a new bolão for any supported league or join one with an invite link.
HomePage.step2Description: Predict match results before they start. Update anytime before kickoff.
HomePage.step3Description: Watch the leaderboard update as matches finish. See who reigns supreme!
HomePage.featureLeaguesDescription: Major soccer leagues supported with automatic fixture updates
HomePage.featureEverywhereDescription: No app to download - works on any device with a browser
HomePage.featureFreeDescription: No subscriptions, no hidden costs, no money involved
HomePage.featureRealtimeDescription: Scores and standings refresh automatically as games end
HomePage.ctaDescription: Create your first bolão in minutes.
